speaker: Morty
dialogue: Hey Rick, what exactly are transformers, like, in terms of computers?

speaker: Rick
dialogue: Morty, do you really want to dive into this synthetic neuro-linguistic mess? Fine. Transformers are like really smart algorithms for understanding and generating language.

speaker: Rick
dialogue: Not just smarter, Morty. Transformers use something called attention to figure out which parts of the input data are important. Its like their version of focusing.

speaker: Morty
dialogue: Attention? Like when I try to pay attention in class?

speaker: Rick
dialogue: Kind of. Except instead of daydreaming, the attention mechanism figures out which words matter more in a sentence. Then it can predict the next word or translate languages, you know, stuff youre bad at.

speaker: Morty
dialogue: Oh man, so they understand languages better than most humans?

speaker: Rick
dialogue: Well, they mimic language patterns really well, but they are not self-aware. They cant brew their own coffee or complain about Mondays, Morty.
